body:
oh, that sounds like a bug. @nrosado can you reproduce that with multiple browsers (chrome, firefox, …)? also what’s your configuration (server, database, operating system)?

@schiesbn can you look into this?
i can't reproduce it. can your check your apache error log, owncloud.log and maybe also the js console of your browser for any error messages?

this sounds like a server config issue.

i just tried to find some information about "php fatal error: maximum function nesting level of '100' reached". php doesn't have a limit for nested function calls but some extensions do have such limits. it seems like most user which run in this limit have xdebug enabled.

read here how you can adjust the settings for xdebug: http://xdebug.org/docs/all_settings#max_nesting_level

if you don't run xdebug than the problem is most likely caused by another php extension you have enabled.
@nrosado did the problem still exists with oc5.0.3, did you checked the php extensions i mentioned above?
still i can't reproduce the bug and since there was no reaction since one month i will close this report now. feel free to re-open it if the bug still exists for you.
